item.desc: Added section "Tools" to SCMP, changed lay-out.
First impression of presentation on Tuesday 2009/12/08.
Integrating and testing JBoss in Eclipse, in collaboration with Sina
Wrote wiki on setup of Eclipse with JBoss and TestNG integrated.
Edited en extended existing slides and created new slides, in collaboration with Sina.
Second rehearsal for presentation on Thursday 2009/12/12.
